title: Hiragana Quiz - Set 2
description: Test your knowledge of hiragana characters with this quiz. Identify the correct hiragana character for each given pronunciation.

items.question: さ
items.hint: Starts with a short diagonal line, followed by a longer one.

items.question: し
items.hint: Resembles the letter 'shi' with a curve at the top.

items.question: す
items.hint: Looks like the letter 'su' with a curve at the top.

items.question: せ
items.hint: Combination of two strokes: a horizontal line and a curve.

items.question: そ
items.hint: Combination of three strokes: a vertical line, a curve, and a short line.

items.question: た
items.hint: Looks like the letter 'ta' with a small hook at the top.

items.question: ち
items.hint: Combination of two strokes: a short horizontal line and a longer diagonal line.

items.question: つ
items.hint: Resembles the letter 'tsu' with a curve at the top.

items.question: て
items.hint: Combination of two strokes: a horizontal line and a short curve.

items.question: と
items.hint: Looks like a circle with a small line coming out from the right.
